message.content:
def transform(sequence):
    return sequence[:6] + sequence[6:].replace('0', '9', 1) if sequence[6] == '0' else sequence[:6] + sequence[6:].replace('0', '5', 1) if sequence[6] == '5' else sequence[:6] + sequence[6:].replace('0', '8', 1)
